item.title: R 博客搭建
item.description: 1.1 安装 R RStudio IDE Pandoc (If not install RStudio) 1.1.1 安装 package—blogdown ## Install from CRAN install.packages("blogdown") ## Or, install from GitHub if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("rstudio/blogdown") 1.1.2 安装 Hugo静态网站生成器 # helper function in blogdown to download and install it automatically on

item.title: Shiny Server 专业V1.5.10管理员指南
item.description: Shiny Server 专业V1.5.10管理员指南 Shiny Server使用户可以在互联网上搭建和管理Shiny app。 1.1 系统需求： RedHat or Ubuntu 1.2 安装: 1.2.1 Ubuntu 安装 R sudo apt-get install r-base 安

item.title: Welcome to Hugo-Geo!
item.description: Welcome to hugo-geo, a resposive theme for the Hugo static site generator. Hugo is designed for post and tutorial sections, and is perfect for personal portfolio or blog sites. Why don’t you check out the Getting Started Tutorial and find out how you can use hugo-geo and customize it to your liking.
